Views and templates¶

Bambu Webhooks provides a single view, which allows the user to assign a URL to each webhook.

bambu_webhooks.views.webhooks(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

The webhook management view. It autodiscovers the registerd webhooks and creates a form with a separate URL field for each one. Once validated, the form is saved and the user redirected back to the same page, with a message letting them know the process was a success.

This view requires a valid user account with webhooks.change_webhook permission.

Templates¶

webhooks/manage.html¶

This template renders the management form, and is based on webhooks/base.html, which in turn simply extends base.html.
